name: Football Decentralized
description: Footdex (Football Decentralized) aspires to be one of the most popular virtualized soccer games, based on blockchain technology, that draws millions of fans of soccer, NFT, and Play- To-Earn games. Footdex will be designed as a humorous and thrilling Play-To-Win game for Football Fans. We combine blockchain and creativity to bring together millions of followers from across the world and turn unique ideas into reality in the virtual world. Because all actions in Football Decentralize are founded on Smart contracts, Our core team will produce the most Fair-Play game ever.
